name: Sosoft Information Technologies
goal: Sosoft is an R&D company, located in Ankara, Turkey, developing software and hardware solutions. We are currently working on e-health and cybersecurity areas.
interests: Communication, Competition, Development, Education, Energy, Enterprise, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation
euInitiatives: We have been developing wearables for in-house health monitoring of elderly. So we are taking into account EU e-health directives.
